title: Phishing Simulation – SWG Audit
description: Test perimeter security against credential theft. Phishing simulation levels: zero‑hour, URL spoofing, credential submission block.
keywords: SWG Audit, phishing test, credential theft, zero‑hour, URL spoofing, perimeter security
headline: Validate the real-world effectiveness of your perimeter security against Phishing
subline: Phishing campaigns exploit URL reputation evasion and reverse proxy techniques. Credentials and session cookies are stolen even with MFA. Attackers register lookalike domains, get them categorised as safe, then deploy a phishing kit in the zero‑hour window.
instructions: Configure URL filters to block phishing websites, while allowing swgaudit.com for testing.
